tool_description: Tests audio hardware including speakers, headphone jacks, microphone inputs, and audio driver functionality.
error_messages: Invalid audio outputs: Use speakers, headphones, hdmi_audio, or usb_audio.
Invalid audio inputs: Use microphone, line_in, or usb_microphone.
No audio hardware detected: Audio devices not found or drivers missing.
usage: Specify audio_outputs array and optionally audio_inputs array. Enable test_frequencies for comprehensive audio frequency testing.

output_test_results.description: Test results for each audio output

input_test_results.description: Test results for each audio input
